name: IT201_Project01_Emily_Kotter
description: The app draws a designated shape as a designated color that rotates vertically along with the user’s mouse. Left click will continuously draw the shape, right click draws one shape and that’s it. There is a drop down with three different shapes (capsule, sphere, and cube) to pick from, along with three sliders to change the red, green, and blue values of the color for the material of the chosen shape. It also displays the mouse location in the bottom right.
